Download explanation: Your document is now ready; we are emailing it to you too.

closed:
##thanks to {{total}} supporters!

We have closed this action, but our work does not end here, so please **leave your email to stay informed about the next steps**

consent.confirm: <0>Are you sure?</0><1>By selecting ‘No’, you won’t be able to find out if this campaign is successful, or if there is more action we need to take together to win it. If you select ‘Yes’ we’ll keep you updated about this and our other urgent campaigns.</1><2>You can unsubscribe at any time.</2>
consent.confirmOptIn: Don’t forget to check your mailbox (including your spam folder!) and confirm your email subscription
consent.implicit: Submit this form to receive emails from {{name}}
consent.intro: Find out more about our campaigns, actions and {{campaign}} progress
consent.opt-in: Yes, I want {{partner}} to keep me informed via email
consent.opt-in-both: Yes, I want {{partner}} and {{lead}} to keep me informed via email
consent.opt-out: No, don't send me emails or keep me updated in future
consent.processing: Your personal information will be kept private and held securely. By submitting information you are agreeing to the use of data and cookies in accordance with our <1>privacy policy</1>
consent.required: Your consent is needed to participate
